name: Apple
description: A crisp, sweet fruit with a red or green skin.

name: Banana
description: A long, curved fruit with a yellow skin.

name: Orange
description: A round, juicy fruit with an orange skin.

name: Grape
description: Small, sweet fruits that grow in clusters.

name: Strawberry
description: A small, red fruit with tiny seeds on the outside.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, round, blue fruits with a slightly sweet taste.

name: Raspberry
description: Small, red fruits with a slightly tart taste.

name: Mango
description: A sweet, tropical fruit with a yellow or orange flesh.

name: Pineapple
description: A large, prickly fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, juicy fruit with a green rind and red flesh.

name: Avocado
description: A creamy, green fruit with a single large seed.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, fuzzy fruit with a green flesh and tiny black seeds.

name: Cherry
description: Small, round fruits with a red or black skin.

name: Peach
description: A fuzzy, juicy fruit with a yellow or white flesh.

name: Plum
description: A small, round fruit with a smooth skin and a juicy flesh.

name: Pear
description: A sweet fruit with a bell-shaped body.

name: Chili
description: A hot, spicy fruit often used as a vegetable.

name: Lime
description: A small, green fruit with a sour taste.

name: Cantaloupe
description: A type of melon with a light orange flesh.

name: Honeydew
description: A type of melon with a pale green flesh.
